'''''Other Hands'' 14''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''.

* '''Published:''' July [[1996]]

==Contents==
*Editorial: Better Late than Never - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Communications - Fredrik Ekman, Christina Scull
*Frontlines - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Digital Hands - Fredrik Ekman
*A Taste of Things to Come (Umbar) - Jason Beresford
*The Unique Magic of Middle-earth - David Woolpy
*The Ships of Belfalas Bay - [[Anders Blixt]]
*Arda Lore:
**Is ''The Silmarillion'' just a Mannish Myth? - Bernie Roessler
**Just what ''did'' happen that night on Weathertop? - Bernie Roessler
**Were there Schools in Middle-earth? - Tommy Martin
**What ever happened to the Blue Wizards? - Tommy Martin, Adam Miller, Dave Craft, Georg Donde, Mark Thorne, [[Chris Seeman]], Mike Edly, Doug Pearson 
**What was the original name for the Hornburg? - [[Chris Seeman]]
**Was Harondor forested? (Response to Wesley Frank, OH 12: 42-43) - Dirk Brandherm 
**What is the nature of Magic in Middle-earth? - Marcus Wevers
**How Does Middle-earth Magic Translate into ''Rolemaster''? - John Feil
**Are There Middle-earth Equivalents to Essence, Channeling, and Mentalism? - [[Chris Seeman]], Steffen Solomon, Luke Potter, Steve Danielson
*Product Review: Middle-earth: The Wizards - Marco Antonio Blanco Navarrete
*Product Review: Southern Gondor: The Land - Randy Gilbertson
*Product Review: Southern Gondor: A Second Review - Luke T. Potter
